name: Pika Pika no Mi
description: The Pika Pika no Mi is a Logia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to create, control, and transform into light at will, granting them the ability to move at the speed of light.
weaknesses: Requires reflective surfaces for optimal movement
history: This fruit is currently used by Marine Admiral Borsalino, also known as Kizaru.
